overview:
karan chanana’s Home Page

I completed my ph.d in Ece at Reeaser Polytechnic Institute, ( NY US) in May 1987.

My doctoral research was performed at the Center for Image Processing Research(CIPR), and involved the application of optical flow techniques to video coding and motion compensated processing. A more detailed description of this research can be found here, and a postscript version of the thesis is available here.
